# Skills Catalog

This repository adapts Anthropic's Skills concept for GitHub Copilot.

| Skill Name | Description | Path |
|------------|-------------|------|
| Skills Creator | Guidelines for creating and maintaining skills in this repository. | `.claude/skills/skill-creator/SKILL.md` |
| A11y Personas | Library of accessibility personas representing people with various disabilities, impairments, and situational limitations. | `.claude/skills/a11y-personas/SKILL.md` |
| A11y Tester | Tools and templates for accessibility issue reporting and validation. | `.claude/skills/a11y-tester/SKILL.md` |
| MagentaA11y | Accessibility acceptance criteria reference for Web and Native (iOS/Android) components. Query for Gherkin tests, condensed criteria, or developer notes. | `.claude/skills/magentaa11y/SKILL.md` |
| WCAG Expert | Expert knowledge of WCAG 2.2 for accessibility requirements, success criteria, conformance levels, and implementation guidance. | `.claude/skills/wcag-expert/SKILL.md` |

## How to Use Skills

When you encounter a task related to a skill:
1. Read the skill file at the listed path
2. Follow any guidance, standards, or templates provided
3. Use any scripts referenced in the skill file
